text: Aspres-sur-Buëch is a commune in the Hautes-Alpes department and Provence- Alpes-Côte d'Azur region in southeastern France. == Transport == === Road === The D993, D994A, D994B, D994 and D1075 roads pass through the commune. The D1075 road is part of European route E712 at this point. === Rail === Aspres- sur-Buëch has a station. == Geography == The area surrounding Aspres-sur-Buëch is quite hilly. == Population == == References == Category:Communes in Hautes- Alpes
title: Aspres-sur-Buëch
